title: Bones & Other Spine-tingling Stories
description: Introducing an exciting new literary voice of terror….and she has ways to keep you scared! A girl has a chance to resurrect the skeletons resting deep within the bowels of her basement into a family that once was. It’s back to the mental ward for a poor depressed student surrounded by gloom and very little hope. A businessman falls prey to a Hobo from Hell. These spine-tingling stories are sure to thrill any reader from young adult and beyond daring to peruse these pages. “Emma Wynn rocks! Thrilling, witty and scary, I can’t wait to see what she does next!” --Franchisca Weatherman, radio show host (Francy & Friends) and author of WHEREWOLF.
author: Emma Wynn
